description: Your love awaits beyond the bounds of this world! Play as Takuya, an academy student who discovers the secret to time travel thanks to a mysterious gift from his deceased father. Use the Reflector Device to travel through multiple timelines and gather clues to unlock the truth resting beneath Sword Cape!
name: YU-NO: A girl who chants love at the bound of this world.
intro:
Your Love Awaits Beyond This World. 
Discover the mysteries of Sword Cape in this classic visual novel!
